channel.title: Development on BlitzLiving
channel.description: Recent content in Development on BlitzLiving

item.title: BlockGiving- A decentralized giving network
item.description: Colony Hackathon Submission A decentalized, self-perpuating, cross-border giving network on top of COLONY Project Description This project now lives at Github Goal: To create a self-perpetuating, decentralized, cross-borders, Giving Platform.

item.title: Designing a scalable content crawler with a dashboard
item.description: Goals: To create a comprehensive repository of blogposts from multiple sources. Shorten time required to find relevant items to post read and search. To provide our users a steady stream of content relevant to the Interests & Topics selected by them.
